title: Intel is investing over $30 billion to build new chip factories in Europe
content:
Intel is continuing to invest more and more money in its chip manufacturing infrastructure. The company has announced new plans to invest over €33 billion – roughly $36 billion – to build or expand manufacturing facilities across the EU. That’s just an early number – Intel says it could invest as much as €80 billion

The post Intel is investing over $30 billion to build new chip factories in Europe appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Intel is planning to invest over $30 billion to create or expand manufacturing facilities in Europe, including Germany and Ireland.
